Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Controller
extends Observable
implements Observer
This controller parse all the messages coming from the sockets and if they're correct change the state of the model calling on it the corresponding method.
It uses an internal Finite State Machine with the sequence of actions that the current player must follow

  • Method Details

    • parseInput

      public void parseInput​(java.lang.String message)
      Parses the input message from the client and calls the matching methods. It also checks if the client is following the right path
      Parameters:
      message - should be "player name action row column"
